caption.center: SHADRICK NORTON, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from an order of the Circuit Court for Leon County, Thomas H. Bateman, III, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Nancy A. Daniels, Public Defender; Terry Carley, Assistant Public Defender, Tallahassee, for appellant.
Charlie Crist, Attorney General; Terry P. Roberts and Thomas D. Winokur, Assistants Attorney General, Tallahassee, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
KAHN, C.J., WOLF, and BENTON, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
